Body: I downloaded a game from some website, not Play Store. The download consists of two files, namely an APK (StarFront: Collision HD) and data/cache files (OBB), but the OBB is a bunch of loose files that still needs to be compiled into one.How can I compile it into one OBB file? (Alternatively, how can I install an APK manually which needs OBB file?)Here's the link: http://pdalife.ru/starfront-collision-hd-android-a2738.htmlIt's in Russian though, use google translate. I'm not quite positive about what kinda answer it'd be that's why I came to you
Title: How to compile OBB data associated with an APK, into one OBB file?

history.Text: I downloaded a game from some website, not playstore. The download consists of two files namely an apk (starfront collision hd) and data/cache files (obb), but the obb is a bunch of loose files that still needs to be compiled into one. I hope this is understandable, please help
